short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add-on that shows the details of a business on Google Maps with a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin offers a unique feature to Google Maps users. While browsing on Google Maps, it allows users to quickly and easily get in-depth information about businesses that interest them. When a user clicks on a business or review, this plugin automatically opens a popup window and shows detailed information about the business, customer reviews, ratings and other important information. With its user-friendly interface and easy accessibility, this plugin is an excellent tool to enrich the Google Maps experience.
